profile: Visit our new website: www.art-metal.ca We are a family owned and operated company manufacturing wrought iron railings and other iron products based in Toronto, Ontario. Our mission is to provide you with highest quality iron products at a low cost and to ensure your satisfaction with our product and service. Our core value: In today's construction business industry we encounter many companies who simply rush, cheat, and work around the right way of doing things. Having work done with utmost integrity, honesty, and compassion is our number one value in a project. We provide lifetime warranty on galvanized iron work. We also provide services for: fences & gates, patios & decks, floor refinishing

profile:
Green Side Up Contracting Inc. is a professional member of Landscape Ontario & we are an authorized TrexPro - Platinum status!

Over the last 22 years, we have established ourselves within the construction industry as an honest and reputable contractor.  We have earned this reputation by shaping the company around four core values: honesty, transparency, quality of workmanship, backed by above industry-standard warranties!

As the President of Green Side Up Contracting Inc. and a board member of the Toronto Chapter of Landscape Ontario, PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT and delivering EXCELLENCE are two of Jay's key priorities.

         ****************************10 YEAR STRUCTURAL WARRANTY - FENCING ****************************

Green Side Up Contracting Inc is a consistent award-winning, construction company that focuses on delivering high-quality workmanship and superior customer service.  We put our trust into our clients with extremely favorable payment terms - pay when the job is completed! We are active members of our community and believe in helping those who are less fortunate.

Services provided include but are not limited to:

-> Fence Construction (80' linear feet minumum)
 
-> Interlocking & Landscape Construction

-> Deck Construction (200 sq foot minumim) 

    - Trex
    - Cedar

***

Not only does Green Side Up Contracting Inc focus on PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT by offering a TEN-YEAR structural WARRANTY on fencing, we also believe that doing business together should be simple and transparent.

***

Please use our SELF SERVE CALCULATORS to obtain an INSTANT ESTIMATE for your DECK, FENCE or INTERLOCK project:

FENCE CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/fence-building-calculator/

DECK CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/deck-calculator/

INTERLOCKING CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/interlock-cost-calculator/

***

Please be sure to check our work by visiting:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/greensideupcontracting/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRNuc7PofUOEHCwMf7NdUzQ/videos?view_as=subscriber

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GreenSideUpContracting/

We would also invite you to come on site during the construction process, so you can see our work in progress!

***

Building is fun, business is great, people are terrific and life is wonderful! 

I ask that you put your trust into Green Side Up Contracting - we not disappoint!!

On your side,

Jay Saveall

www.greensideupcontracting.com
service_area:
The maintenance side of our business covers Aurora, Newmarket, and North Richmond Hill. In the winter months we only service Aurora residential & Commercial & Commercial only in Newmarket

Our landscape construction side of our business covers the entire G.T.A.

profile:
We are Action Home Services, and we always take action for every construction service that you need. Based in Toronto, Ontario, we are a general contracting company that specializes in a wide range of services. We will help you to design and build an outside living area of your dream. Do not wait! Take action with Action Home Services. Check our website at http://actionhomeservices.ca/ to find out more. 

Our Mission
We aim to become one of the most successful construction companies within Toronto, Ontario. This mission will not happen if our services are not up to the level of what our customers are expecting. Thus our main aim is to provide the best services to our customers. Our level of professionalism will become our barometer for customer satisfaction. We also aim to make it a point to have strong ties with our customers so we can grow the level of our professionalism and gain more trust among our clients.

Our Vision
Our dream is to become the one-stop shop for any kind of construction service that any of our clients need. We initially started with interlocking and asphalt paving, but we are now venturing into other services such as landscaping, pressure washing and sealing, concreting, decks and fences, demolition services and many more. We already have a wide range of service offerings, but we are not satisfied with just these. We are excited about every project that we perform and our possibilities for improvement and additional services are endless.

Our Commitment 
We commit to do whatever it takes to achieve the level of satisfaction our customer deserves. Our workmanship will leave a lasting mark and one that will be a reminder of our professionalism and close ties with our clients. We gained the trust of our customers through hard work that pays off when we see our clients happy with the outcome of our services. We will strive to be cooperative and readily available for any queries or requests our customer needs.

profile:
With franchises in over 60 cities in Canada, we’ve designed and built over 25,000 beautiful composite decks and have worked hard to earn our reputation as the best in the deck business.

To us, every project we undertake is not just a deck – it’s a Hickory Dickory Deck. That means it’s constructed to the highest standards using the best materials. It means it’s built by professional carpenters and craftspeople who adhere to the Hickory Dickory Decks philosophy and are careful to represent our brand well, every day. That means that you – our valued customer – will receive the best deck money can buy, backed by our complete satisfaction guarantee.

profile:
M.E. Contracting is one of Toronto's premier outdoor solutions companies. 

M.E. was Founded by owners Keren and Eitan Abu, with a desire to change the face of Toronto through the revitalization of outdoor living space. The “M” and “E” stand for Keren and Eitan's daughters, Mika and Emma. From the start these two girls have inspired the vision of innovation and creativity that M.E. embodies today. 

Specializing in custom landscape design, M.E. Contracting has spent over a decade executing this vision of innovation and construction. From decking to interlocking tile and pool building, M.E. Contracting differs from other Toronto landscapers through our commitment to excellence and attention to even the smallest of details. 

Want to see for yourself? Our 7,000 square foot landscaping showroom is the only showroom in Ontario dedicated to landscaping and outdoor transformations. Our exquisite showroom encapsulates features of all the custom design elements that every home owner dreams of having in their outdoor home space. In addition to the amazing  materials we have on display, our showroom includes an in-ground swimming pool with waterfalls, outdoor kitchens and outdoor furniture for prospective clients to experience.

Our vast experience in all aspects of landscaping design and construction has provided us with the ability to take on an array of projects, both varying in shape and size. Now matter what our goal to produce astounding and exceptional work remains unchanging. We aim to go above and beyond in our passion for what we do, and as a result we aim to surpass our client’s expectations with each and every element of landscaping design.

services:
ME contracting & Landscaping provides complete outdoor design and building services such as: Landscaping design, landscaping architect, deck building, PVC decks, interlocking, driveway paving, fences, pergolas, gazebos and more. We pay attention to the smallest of details and strive to achieve outstanding quality projects while focusing on customer service and customer satisfaction. 
Our deck builders & landscaping teams have many years of experience building decks in Toronto, paving driveways and landscaping. Our landscaping and deck building services are offered throughout the greater Toronto area especially to Toronto, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Markham, Thornhill and Maple. call us today for a free onsite consultation.

profile:
Canada’s Gardenland is a leading domestic landscape construction and maintenance service provider in the Greater Toronto area. Our team of lawn specialists utilizes their knowledge of lawn science and their skills of artistic application to create the perfect look for your specific landscaping scenario. We understand that each property and client taste is different so we work diligently with you and your surroundings to tailor the best approach for meeting those needs. Canada’s Gardenland has both the tools and the experience available to help you bring your landscaping dream to life.
Canada’s Gardenland designs, creates, maintains and provides tools for domestic landscaping projects in the Greater Toronto area. Both artistic landscaping skills and applied lawn science is utilized in order to achieve the perfect atmosphere and our professional team works closely with clients to ensure that projects meet specific needs and requirements.

Proper landscaping requires the application of various aspects in order to make your property look its best. Therefore, Canada’s Gardenland first helps with the design and creation of the right landscaping techniques that complement the natural lay of land as well as any man-made structures on the premises. We also offer a variety of interlocking stone techniques that provide landscaping accents through beautifully designed and applied walkways, driveways and patios.

We can also apply creative outdoor lighting effects so that your landscape is transformed into a stunning sight of beauty after dark and provides safety to those visiting after hours. Quality landscaping maintenance is also offered through sod fertilization, trimming, grooming, replanting and cleaning so that your property always looks its best.

profile:
Whether you’re a do-it-yourselfer and need posts or deck footings, or you’re looking for a complete fence solution, GNFP is here to assist you!

The hardest part about building your own fence or deck is digging the post holes. Many new construction sites, as well as existing yards, are filled with rock and other debris, making post hole construction a real problem.

Don't pay to rent a dangerous gas auger and still end up struggling for days in the hot sun! Call on the experts at GNFP!
services:

Gas Line Hand Hole Digging,

Post Setting,

Fence Design,

Fence Construction, 
– Pre-Fabricated & Custom Fence Repairs,

Deck Piers & Footings,

Bollards

profile:
Avanti Landscaping is a Rapidly growing construction company who specializes in landscape construction. We have been proudly serving GTA for over 10 years and have left hundreds of satisfied costumers. 

Our approach is very simple: we work hard to keep our clients happy. We have a unique relationship with each client as needs vary. 

Our crews are highly experienced and work in a professional and safe manner. 

Although our journey began with basic landscaping and interlocking projects, we have added multiple services throughout years. 

As of today our services include but not limited to:
-landscape design
-interlocking paver driveways and walkways
-custom decks, pergolas and fences
-asphalt,interlock and wood repair work
-deck and driveways rehabilitation services
-concrete work
-asphalt paving
-sodding and planting
-irrigation and lighting systems
-natural stone work
-excavation, demolition and grading services
-foundation repair services
-additions

profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

profile: ROYAL Decks Co. is a custom decking company priding itself in high quality of work and complete customer satisfaction. ROYAL Decks Co. focuses on specialty materials, such as exotic hardwoods, low maintenance materials and high grades of cedar. ROYAL Decks Co. offers a complete solution for a homeowner from custom designs to the execution of the project. ROYAL Decks Co. was founded in Burlington Ontario and quickly grew to serve all surrounding areas of Toronto and also Calgary since 2008 onwards. We are successful because we take every deck builder project as if it was the only one, although we build hundreds each year. Our success is based on the following five core values: Great design Quality work Build on time and budget Provide great warranty Safety Great design In order for the deck to be great, it has to be usable, look great and fulfill all of the customer's expectations. With our extensive experience, we will work with you to design the deck that will serve the purpose, according to your needs. This means getting the right size and shape of the deck, getting the right features and selecting the right materials. We work with many materials of different properties and we are sure to find one that will work for you. Build quality We have only the most experienced carpenters. Our carpenters have been in construction most of their lives and they build decks not because they have to, but because they love it. All of our decks have to meet very strict ROYAL Decks Co. quality control on top of any building code requirements. Our decks not only meet building code, they exceed it. Build on time and on budget Our estimate includes time frame when the project will be started, how long it will take and how much exactly it will cost. We strive to make the construction process an enjoyable experience. That is why we take these extra seriously. Provide great warranty We are proud to give one of the best warranties in the business to every deck that carries ROYAL Decks Co. name on it. We stand behind the work that we do. To see details about our warranty please visit our warranty website. Safety Safety is our utter most requirement doing any work. We carry both WCB and WSIB, to date without a single claim. We keep our workplace neat and organized to minimize any injuries. Sincerely, Miro

profile:
ABOUT US

Odd Job Handyman Services began in 2008 with one man and his truck. It's since grown to be one of the largest and most reliable contractors in Toronto, serving thousands of homeowners and businesses throughout the city. On Feb. 16, 2017, it was one of five handyman services in Ontario to be officially named "Best of 2017" by Homestars, the largest network of home professionals in Canada. 

Odd Job offers a wide range of services including drywall, painting, tiling, flooring, millwork, hanging, junk removal, furniture assembly, basic plumbing & electrical and all general repairs. The work performed by Odd Job is covered by a two-year warranty. 

The staff at Odd Job is fully licensed, bonded and insured, and every member has been background-and-identity-checked. They're hand-selected from the "best of the best" in local professional circles (each with at least three positive references) and subjected to a series of in-shop tests before they're admitted into the team. 

HISTORY

It all started with Justin George, an exceptionally-handy property manager who had great difficulty convincing professional contractors to visit his building for "small jobs." Justin, a red seal tradesman, was so tired of contractors telling him "it wasn't worth their time" that he was forced to take care of most of the repairs and maintenance himself.

He realized he was far from the only person who was in this predicament. There were many people without the time, the tools or the talent to recaulk their shower stall, hang their favourite paintings or repair a few pot lights. 

Not everyone trusts the mystery men on Craigslist and Kijiji, and so Justin wanted to provide them a professional option. "It might be a small job, but it's a big deal," Justin said, "People need a company that treats it that way."

Mr. George graduated from George Brown College with a degree in mechanical engineering and from the University of Western Ontario in 2011 with a degree in technological education, manufacturing and construction. He is an Accredited Manufacturing and Construction Educator and a member in good standing of the Association of Certified Handyman Professionals (ACHP). He loves cats, guitar and building things (anything). His most important values are honesty, quality and consistency and his motto is: "There's always a way to get the job done right." 

PRICING

We offer a la carte, task-based pricing for all of our standard services. Our extensive experience has given us a tried-and-true system for evaluating the duration and cost for virtually every standard project." 

BUSINESS & PROPERTY MANAGEMENT SERVICES

Odd Job also serves many small businesses, including retail stores, office facilities and income properties. Our project manager was a longtime property manager and every member of the team has extensive experience in facilities management. Among the many businesses that trust Odd Job are Shoppers Drug Mart, Holt Renfrew, Burberry, Fresh Restaurants and LensCrafters.

Let us take care of you while you take care of business!

services:
We offer a wide range of handyman services, including all general repairs, hanging, grout and caulking, furniture assembly & maintenance, cabinetry installation, carpentry, painting (mostly interior), drywall installation & repairs, door installation & repairs, deck installation & repairs, fence installation & repairs, shelving installation, window treatment installations, basic plumbing, site work, demolitions, clean-up, junk removal, and much more.

We also offer premium renovation services. Call (416) 520-1161 and request a quote from our renovations division today. We will establish a budget, timeline and plan in advance, and then provide the highest quality of labour, materials and expertise to make it happen.

We offer a wide range of maintenance services to homeowners, tenants, property owners, real estate agents and many of the city's most important businesses. Odd Job offers a la carte pricing for all of our services. Our extensive experience has given us a tried-and-true system for evaluating the duration and cost for virtually every standard project.
specialities: We specialize in the things found on your "honey-do" list - hanging, drywall, tiling, all general repairs, and small to mid-size renovations.
payment_method: Visa, MasterCard, Interac, Check, Cash, E-Transfer
warranty_terms: Our 2-year warranty covers all general repairs and some installations. The warranty does not cover moisture damage, ground shifting, weather-related damage, material failure or change in mind.

profile:
Welcome to Craft-Bilt Materials Ltd
We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. For 17 years we operated from the old Wrisco location, a 32,000 square foot facility in the Toronto suburb of Markham. In February of 2009, we moved to our current custom designed, 40,000 square foot facility in Ajax, Ontario (just East of Toronto).

Craft-Bilt’s main business is contractor sales of sunrooms, railing, waterproof decking, awnings and patio covers. We manufacture railing kits, canopy kits and sunroom kits. Our line of retractable fabric shades includes: fabric awnings, motorized screens, free standing canopies and canopies for pergolas.

We take a great deal of pride in the engineering behind our products. Proper engineering is important for obtaining building permits. You will find that Craft-Bilt products exceed the industry standard.

Our sales are primarily to customers in Canada. If you are interested in sunrooms or shade products in the USA, please contact Craft-Bilt Manufacturing Co. in Pennsylvania. They have been producing sunrooms in the United States for over 40 years.

Check us out on these sites as well:
https://www.facebook.com/craft.bilt.materials.ltd
https://twitter.com/CraftBilt
https://www.houzz.com/pro/craftbilt/
https://www.youtube.com/c/Craft-bilt
https://www.instagram.com/craft_bilt/
https://www.pinterest.ca/craftbilt/

4 Season Sunrooms, 3 Season Sunrooms, Aluminum Railing, Aluminum Decking, Patio Covers, Retractable Awnings, Canopies, Solar Shades, Motorized Screens, porch enclosures, screen rooms

Welcome to Deck Space! We specialize in the design and implantation of your outdoor space that will enhance your outdoor living experience. We will work with you to create the perfect space that you need, providing great customer service and staying with in budget. 

***

Our Services:

***

Custom Decks, Fences, Pergolas, Sheds and Landscaping

GR-General Renovation is a family owned and operated, residential and commercial contractor focused on providing quality service in Toronto and the GTA. We specialise in drywall and kitchen installation, maintenance, painting, and framing of various residential and commercial renovating systems. GR-General Renovation is fully licensed and insured. Our 24 hour service and quick response makes the difference in renovations Toronto throughout all seasons. 
 
Our services include inspection, consultation and recommendation of proper methods, materials and estimates to solve all our customers’ individual requirements. Our work is fully guaranteed, backed up by great warranties and provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that their homes will last for years to come. That's how confident we are about our renovating services. Whether it involves old or new built houses/apartments our treatment will be exactly the same in terms of quality. ADDITIONS
Including second story additions.  Enhance your existing home by adding substantial square footage. 

BATHROOMS
- complete demolition and remodelling services

- bathtub/shower fitting
- all necessary plumbing and electrical (subtracted to licensed trade workers when required).

LIVING SPACES
- create open concept design 
- installation of all types of flooring (hardwood, tile, ceramic, porcelain, natural stone, carpet, vinyl)
- walls and ceilings (trim, custom crown moulding)
- beautiful fireplace surrounds 
- high quality paint finishes

BASEMENTS
- complete finishing/remodelling
- apartment conversions (with creation of separate entrance)
- installation of new bathrooms
- kitchens

KITCHENS
- completed demolition/remodelling
- installation of flooring (hardwood, tile, stone, etc.)
- cabinetry installation
- custom backsplashes

- beautiful islands

- windows and doors

LANDSCAPING

profile:
Welcome to BBdecks.ca. We are a full service deck company, founded in 2005 in Toronto, Ontario.  Since then we have grown to serve all of the Greater Toronto Area, including downtown Toronto, North York, Markham, Richmond Hill, Aurora,  Newmarket, Stouffville, Vaughan, Bradford and King City.



Our company is proud of the work it has done to revamp communities throughout the years. Professional deck builders, employed with our company, have more than a decade of experience. We are comprised of professional, young and strong witted individuals who are dedicated to making a difference.



Customers and their needs always come first at Beaver Brothers. Building a deck and designing outdoor living products is a partnership. It requires a healthy relationship between the builder and the customer. We are steadfast at ensuring that our clients are satisfied with the products and services they receive. There are no hidden secrets; each customer will be guided step by step through the process.



Our services are even more focused on designing and building decks with the highest quality workmanship. Our high quality workmanship is always coupled with our positive and hardworking attitude.  This guarantees our clients long-lasting results which they come to easily rely. 80% of our business is done through repeated customers and referrals.  



We have attained the necessary knowledge and experience to tackle almost any job.    Call us today for a free quote and free consultation. We will be more than pleased to answer any questions or concerns you may have.

50 years of experience in the carpentry, design, and construction industry, serving home owners in South and Central Ontario.

profile: Royal Stone is a recognized installer of premier interlocking paving stones, retaining walls, steps, curbs, and natural stone products. Whether you're designing a complete streetscape or a residential walkway, patio and driveway, Royal Stone can provide you with a range of applications. Our qualified staff will take your project from the design stage to completion in an organized and professional manner. Let your surroundings express who you are. Royal Stone's experienced landscape designers will guide you in selecting features that come together to create balance and harmony. Our use of hand drawn and computer-generated renderings effectively bridge the gap between concept and reality, assuring our clients that their new surroundsing will be all that they envisioned - and more. DRIVEWAYS / WALKWAYS Driveways and walkways provide curb appearl to homes. They are a point of artistic expression allowing customers to express their personal style. OUTDOOR LIVING Outdoor living spaces provide an impressive focal point where you can relax, dine and entertain with familiy and friends. Outdoor kitchens, fireplaces and firepits are just some of the possibilities. POOLS Pools provide an impressive focal point where you can relax and entertain with family and friends. Spas are great alternative for spaces wehre a pool is not feasible. profile:
GTA Grizzly is a relatively young company with fresh and modern look at the work process!
⠀
GTA Grizzly is here to help you!
⠀
We strive not only to fulfill your needs, but to solve your problems in a fast, aesthetic and professional manner!
⠀
We are a young player on the market and it is incredibly important to go above and beyond your expectations. We work on our reputation, we want you to spread the word about us and we always strive to implement all your ideas.
⠀
Why are we unique? We have implemented a new way to estimate the costs with high level of accuracy! Forget about unexpected or hidden charges! Forget about quotes “from the top of my mind”, that is normal for most of the companies. We have made this step forward in savings and comfort! GTA Grizzly takes care about the client, because you don’t have to adjust your schedule for extra meetings with us.
⠀
Our team consists of experienced professionals with “burning” eyes for the work. Every client is special and we approach every contract with high level of responsibility, because our reputation is #1 goal for the company. There will be no deficiencies in our work and we are ready to improve the service until we see the smile on your face.
⠀
GTA Grizzly - quality is our power!

We service Commercial and Residential properties all around the GTA. 

Some of the services we provide are:

- Decks and Fences
- Railings
- Powerwashing 
- Parking Lot Maintenance
- Hardscaping and Interlock 
- Flagstone
- Concrete and Stone Steps
- Snowremoval 
- Salting
- Snow Shovelling
- Snow Relocation

KP Construction is a design-build firm located in Toronto and specializes in home renovation, basement finishing, bath renovations, building of outside structures as decks, pergolas, and more. We provide clients with construction project management services from initiation to completion. Our company represents "best practice" regardless of the size and budget of a project.











Using the best available tools and latest renovation techniques, KP Construction creates functional kitchen spaces. You tell us what you want to have in your new kitchen, and we’ll show you how form and function can unite in the most beautiful way. Interesting, innovative, and eye-catching, our kitchen designs are carefully detailed. We consider all the work involved into the renovation to smooth the building process. From design to completion, everything will be carefully managed by our renovation experts.

profile:
KINGSTONE are a licensed construction company with 5 million business insurance. we specialize in interlocking pavers, Landscaping, Natural stone, Maintenance and related applications. From driveway & porch and patios, to retaining walls and all stone features, KINGSTONE offers everything you need in a contractor to get your job done professionally and efficiently. Using the large variety of industry high-quality materials, make your outdoor living spaces, not only exceed your expectations, but also fit into your budget.

  All of our work comes with a full written 24-month guarantee, at no additional cost to you.   

We pride in the quality of our work, also the relationships we build with our clients through the entire process from initial quote, to final project completion. Being homeowners ourselves, gather our suggest & solutions with customer want and needs, put into our work is due to our appreciation for your business, and nothing less than we would expect for ourselves.   

WE DON’T FIGHT A PRICE-WAR, WE FIGHT FOR QUALITY, TRUST OF CUSTOMER IS OUR VICTORY.

 Give us a call for a free quote.

JT Construction Solutions Ltd. is a construction and general contracting firm specialising in both commercial and residential projects.

***
 
Founded by Red Seal carpenters, JT Construction Solutions Ltd has worked on a full and varied range of residential and commercial projects.  Residential work includes renovations, additions, bespoke kitchens and bathrooms, basements, siding (James Hardie, Cape Cod, Fraser, Maibec), doors/windows, fencing/decking. Commercial work includes the Toronto Zoo Giant Panda Exhibit to café, bar, office and retail installations.

profile:
Palmeri Construction is a full-service renovation company offering professional and innovative home improvements and repairs in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 15 years of experience, our team brings quality craftsmanship and reliability to any project we execute.  From interior to exterior renovations, we will work closely with you to turn your house into a home. 

The key to our success is simple – we work with our customers to bring their vision to life and we work hard for our customers to turn their vision into reality. 

We are truly one of a kind and stand out above the rest!!

We are fully licenced and insured; we provide written contracts and back up our work with a 1 year warranty.

We Specialize in all aspects of Interior and exterior residential renovations.

Follow us on twitter to see what projects were currently working on: https://twitter.com/PalmeriCon

profile:
After 15 years in the construction industry, we know what Canadian contractors want; great prices without compromising on quality or style -- all made to withstand Canadian weather.
 
We made it happen. Ecowood Composite Materials Inc. is a Canadian brand, based in Toronto Ontario, that offers a new option to contractors and homeowners looking for new ways to beautify their homes. 

Deforestation in Canada is among the world’s lowest, making our country a world leader in sustainable forest management. Canadian forests are healthy, productive and thriving. Ecowood Composite Inc. is dedicated to helping this initiative by providing high quality alternative products to lumber.

All of our products go through a rigorous R&D process and testing and include a limited lifetime warranty.

profile:
Landscape Contractors & Designers, Decks, Waterproofing Interlocking, Stone Masonry & Bricklaying

Toronto Landscaping Company

Rainbow Landscaping was established in 1988 and has since earned the reputation of being one of Toronto's premier landscape companies. We give our clients a higher quality lifestyle through custom landscape design.

Total Concept Design

Our landscape designers and technicians, in conjunction with the Total Concept Design method of property beautification and improvement, maintain the highest standard of service to each of our clients.

Qualified Landscaping Professionals

At Rainbow Landscaping we have the experience and knowledge to take your vision and make it reality.Our highly qualified professionals offer landscaping designs for your individual lifestyle. Elegant. Impressive. - Walkways - Gardens - Pool landscaping - Backyard landscaping - Front landscaping - Patio ideas - Wet basement repair - Decks - Waterproofing - Masonry & brick laying

Get Social With Rainbow Landscaping

profile:
LOTUS was founded in 2006, and has been providing exceptional service to its customers for more than 10 years.


We strive to meet our clients’ wide variety of requirements and expectations by using quality stone and lumber products, and providing personalized and thoughtful design concepts.


Our unique interlocking, decking and landscaping concepts allow for beauty, usefulness and enjoyment of any outdoor space – big or small.


Our professional knowledge and expertise allows to confidently complete almost any outdoor project.


We offer complimentary consultation and quotations to our customers, along with creative designs and site plans.


From driveways and patios to decks and outdoor kitchens – we look forward to making your dream project a reality!


******************************************************************************************************************

profile:
We are the only deck builder in the industry that offers a "Guaranteed Build Time". If we don't complete your deck in the time frame we promise, you will receive a 5% discount on the full project price. 

Deco Decks is a premium deck building company in the Greater Toronto Area. We are committed to providing excellent customer service and providing a long lasting experience by giving our clients peace of mind through the entire decking building process. We don't just build decks ... We turn dreams into reality. 

Building your deck the "Deco Decks way" is only part of the process. Building a connection and trust with our clients is extremely important to us. This includes ensuring that we not only help you design the deck of your dreams but it also means communicating with you every step of the way so that you are fully informed through every step in the process. We have created systems that allow us to make sure the process goes as smooth as possible so that you have complete peace of mind. 

Visit our website at www.decodecks.ca to learn more about us and what we offer and feel free to book a free telephone consultation or a free site visit while you are there.
products:
Our decking options include Pressure Treated, Cedar, Composite and PVC.
Our railing options include Aluminum with Pickets, Aluminum with Glass, and Frameless Glass.
All available with Lighting, Privacy Screens, Pergolas, and Planters

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Why Trust Us?
From the day we got into business, our goal has been to work on every house as if it were our own. By combining the finest craftsmanship with a level of attention to detail you won’t find anywhere else in the Toronto Area, we’ve made it possible for anyone to create their dream backyard with nothing more than a quick call to the experts they can trust.

Life and Nature...
Everything we do is built from our love of nature and the great outdoors which we get from our founders. They fell in love with woodwork and construction, and decided to create a business that allowed them to share their passion with people right across the local area. At that moment Yardcore Landscaping Design was born and we haven’t looked back since.

By working side by side with every customer and client, we can offer the expert input and finishing touches you won’t find anywhere else. For us it’s not about finishing the job as quickly as possible and moving on to the next property. It’s about creating something that’s built to last that the owners can enjoy for years to come. That way when you hire our team to create the backyard you’ve always wanted, you can sleep with the peace of mind that only comes from knowing you’ve partnered with a team that cares as much about the end result as you do.



Stand on Quality...
We take pride in what we do, and go to great lengths to ensure every fence we erect and deck we lay fits seamlessly into its surroundings. It’s an approach that allows you to reconnect with nature, celebrate everything it has to offer, and enjoy your new space like never before. Not only that, but we also truly believe in what we do. That’s why we offer an exclusive 5 year workmanship warranty with everything we put our name to.

Whether you’re putting the finishing touches to a brand new property, or treating a much loved property to something new, we’re always ready and waiting to lend a hand. It means when you want quality craftsmanship, expert after service, and a team that will always get the job done right the first time, all you have to do is ask.

Life is just better that way.

There are too many renovation companies in the industry but there is not many like The Renovation Monsters.
Our home renovation business serves Toronto and surrounding areas including Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Richmond, Thornhill, Maple. 

We have been in business for over 15 years and we understand that your home is a special place and we promise to always do our best to ensure customer satisfaction.

As a full-service contractor, we have the experience and proven skills to take on all your home renovation requirements and complete the project so its done right, on time and within budget.

Whether you live in Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto or the surrounding area, trust your home renovation to The Renovation Monsters!

We are a premier full service construction contractor serving the needs of York Region homeowners. We specialize in residential renovations, custom build, and general contracting.

We are committed to bringing quality and unique solutions to each renovation with a strong sense of standards and ethics. We aim to bring customer satisfaction to a new level.

Our tradesmen are licensed and members in good standing of a variety of trade organizations. They know the quality that we demand and they take pride in every little detail of their work.

Ours is a competitive industry and we are one of the best in the business. We are privileged to receive many referrals from our customers. We have earned this distinction by going the extra mile to provide outstanding customer service - in fact, your satisfaction is our top priority.

profile:
A thoughtfully designed outdoor space will make you never want to go back inside. Have us create and care for yours. Providing comprehensive solutions in the Greater Toronto Area.

Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed

From the moment you phone us through the completion of your landscaping project, our professionals will make sure that your experience with us is top-notch. Our team pays special attention to all details in projects and will regularly communicate with you till the project is complete. Our priority is to ensure the complete satisfaction of every client.  

We are trained to help clients increase the value and curb appeal of their homes by creating an outdoor environment beyond their imagination. We work together to create elegant landscape designs with the help of our team of landscape designers. We work closely with our customers when designing the space to ensure the complete satisfaction of the results of their project.   

Get In touch!

We strive to be in constant communication with our customers until the job is done. If you have questions or special requests, just drop us a line. To schedule and free quote press the "Get a Quote" button on the top left of our profile. For any further details on our Luxe Landscape and Construction Inc. feel free to visit our website!

profile:
Maritime Construction is an owner operated carpentry and general contracting company focused on producing high quality results.  Working closely with our team of licensed trade professionals, we are dedicated to ensuring the customer experience is pleasant and stress free throughout the entire life cycle of your project.

For over 10 years we have serviced the residential construction industry including but not limited to basement renovations, bathroom renovations, kitchen remodelling, deck building, fence building, as well as larger projects including additions, garages, and whole home renovations.

We take a very customer-focused approach to completing projects. Instead of taking on numerous jobs and moving from site to site trying to finish them, we concentrate on one project at a time, mobilizing and working on one site from start to finish before moving on.

Contact us today for a free onsite assessment and no-obligation estimate for your project at 647-308-3763 or email us at chris@maritimeconstruction.ca for more information.

Regards,
Chris Rogers
Owner
www.maritimeconstruction.ca

profile:
At Your Deck Company, we know we have done our job if our customers receive an effortless experience. From the initial deck consultation to the creation of your project, we will guide you every step of the way and make the process as professional and easy as possible. 
***
We understand the disruptions caused by a construction project, so we aim to keep any intrusion on your family time and space to an absolute minimum. Over the years we have refined our process to help assist you, and guide us, towards a pleasant construction experience.
***
Consultation:
Our consultation starts with you. We know you’ve looked at pictures on the Internet. Perhaps it’s a neighbour’s deck that got you thinking. Whatever the case, we want to hear all about your great ideas and how you want to utilize your outdoor space. After an initial call, we will come out to your place to see your space and discuss your deck project.
***
After 30 plus years of deck building, we have heard a lot of amazing ideas and built a lot of creative decks. We utilize our deep deck building experience to help you bring your ideas into reality. We will educate you on a wide variety of building and finishing options and then help you chose the best ones to meet your needs. We will also measure up your property while we are there. Our goal is to make your deck experience pleasant. After all, you are building a place to relax and have fun on and the last thing we want is for the construction phase to be anything short of enjoyable.

profile:
Welcome to Citywide Post Hole Diggers

With our quality service and affordable pricing, City Wide Post Hole Digging ensures that our customers are always 100% satisfied. 

Our staff is friendly and courteous, and we never cut corners on any of our fencing, deck or post hole projects. We service Toronto and the Greater Toronto Area.

Over 15 years of experience working with the great folks of the GTA. 

KINDLY note that if you require a fence it MUST BE a minimum 100 linear feet.  There is no minimum on post holes or deck footings/deck footing work....Call us and discuss what is possible.

profile:
Industry Leading Design Build Team

We are Toronto’s most professional source for custom designed and expertly installed outdoor living projects including decks, cabanas, pergolas, and screened rooms. Whatever your vision is, our expert designers will work with you to bring your dreams to reality on time and within budget. We invite you to experience the difference and understand why we are Canada’s premier deck builder – right here in Toronto. All of our decks are built to exceed building code standards with helical footings to assure that your deck remains level permanently. Plus they are backed by our unprecedented 10-year workmanship warranty.

With 8 showrooms in Ontario to help you visualize your project and our wide range of available features and products, there is nowhere else you need to go for your decking needs. We have deck frame options of galvanized steel or aluminum and dozens of railing and screen selections in aluminum, glass or composite – not to mention our amazing shade canopy systems as well as low voltage lighting! You can also find the largest selection of wood, composite, PVC, and stone decking anywhere in Ontario in our stores.

We are happy to offer a free ½ hour design consultation with one of our talented designers in a local showroom, (Oakville, Toronto, Mississauga, Oshawa, Kitchener, Stoney Creek and Ottawa) or call to arrange a low-cost site consultation right in your own home.
service_area: Oakville, Mississauga, Toronto, Brampton, Burlington, Hamilton, Newmarket, Vaughan, Aurora, Markham, Guelph, Milton, Georgetown, St Catherines, London, Kitchener, Waterloo, Ottawa, Oshawa
products:
Decking & Outdoor Products
Nine Showrooms in Ontario

The Deck Store is Canada’s premier deck and outdoor living design, supply, and build company. At strategically located indoor showrooms across Ontario, our experienced professionals are dedicated to providing the best selection of decking materials along with unmatched service to our clients.

The Deck Store prides itself on being the largest volume dealer of decking and outdoor building materials in the Canadian market. It is our goal to provide you with as many material and design options as possible, and our highly skilled team of product specialists, designers and craftsmen can turn any outdoor dream into a reality. 

Low maintenance decking brands that we offer include Wolf, Zuri, Clubhouse, TimberTech, Azek, Trex, Fiberon, Endeck and more. In wood, we offer Micro Pro Sienna Brown Treated, knotty and clear cedar, Ipe, Garapa and more. Our stone deck selections include Mbrico and StoneDeck. We also have a large selection of railings including aluminum, composite and vinyl railings as well as glass, laser cut metal and fabric screens.

- Consulting & Designing
- Design / Build
- Project Management
- Material Sales

profile:
We are an authorized supplier and distributor of Composite Wood Decking Board. All our products are of the highest quality and latest technology in terms of research, development, design, assembly and workmanship. We pride ourselves to always put product quality and supporting services as the ultimate goal of customer satisfaction.

Investment in science and technology has been ever increasing in an effort to strengthen its competitiveness in a trend of economic globalization.

Our core technology and major raw materials are all imported from Japan. Strict production process and quality control ensure each batch of products to meet the international standers.

During last 5 years our new type Eco-friendly outdoor building materials are welcomed by our Canadian customers.

New Wood Technologies welcome your presence and look forward to establish long term business relationship with you.

We work with experienced contractors to develop our product line and provide the best customer service and installation referrals.  Our product line is always evolving to ensure that the highest quality and latest products are available to our customers.  We offer competitive contractor pricing and custom ordering.

In conjunction with our sister company Victoria LED Lights, we offer a large range of outdoor deck and garden lighting to enhance and display your new exterior space.

New Wood Technologies Canada is located in St. George, Ontario, conveniently located to service the GTA and Western Ontario areas.  Our Showroom is located at the Improve Canada Centre in Vaughan, centrally located in the GTA to provide service to both contractors and the do-it-yourself home improvement specialists.
